TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件的 SQL 数据库。

span.span: Represents an SQL database to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [数据连接Data Connections](#data_connections) - [执行数据操作Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [数据提供程序Data Provider](#data_provider) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [数据源视图Data Source View](#data_source_view) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 数据源控件表示数据绑定控件 SQL 关系数据库中的数据。The data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls. 你可以使用结合控件与数据绑定控件从关系数据库中检索数据并将显示、 编辑，并在具有很少或没有代码的 Web 页上的数据进行排序。You can use the control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code. ## 数据连接Data Connections 若要连接到数据库，必须设置属性设置为有效的连接字符串。To connect to a database, you must set the property to a valid connection string. 可以支持任何 SQL 关系数据库可以连接到使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，如`SqlClient`， `OleDb`， `Odbc`，或`OracleClient`提供程序。The can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider. 有关如何保护连接字符串的信息，请参阅[How To： 安全连接字符串时使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). 若要从基础数据库中检索数据，将设置用 SQL 查询的属性。To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the property with an SQL query. 如果数据库的关联支持存储过程，你可以设置到存储过程的名称的属性。If the database that the is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the property to the name of a stored procedure. 你指定的 SQL 查询也可以是参数化的查询。The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query. 你可以添加与参数化查询到关联的对象集合。You can add objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the collection. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和其语法的详细信息，请参阅[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). 控件中检索数据时调用方法。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 此方法提供以编程方式访问由指定的方法属性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 方法将自动调用绑定到控件时其调用方法。The method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the when their method is called. 如果你设置数据绑定控件的属性，该控件自动将绑定到数据从数据源，根据需要。If you set the property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required. 设置`DataSourceID`属性是绑定的建议的方法到数据绑定控件的控件。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，可以使用`DataSource`属性，但你必须显式调用的数据绑定控件的方法。Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the method of the data-bound control. 可以使用的数据绑定控件的一些示例是， ， ，和。Some examples of data-bound controls that can use are , , , and . 你可以调用以编程方式在任何时候从基础数据库检索数据的方法。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database. 在声明性和编程 ASP.NET 方案中，你可以设置数据绑定控件的 id 属性控件。In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the property of the data-bound control to the ID of the control. 你还可以分配的实例类到数据绑定控件属性。You can also assign an instance of the class to the property of the data-bound control. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问选项](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d)。For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d). ## 执行数据操作Performing Data Operations 具体取决于基础的数据库产品和的实例的配置的功能类，你可以执行数据操作，如更新、 插入和删除。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes. 若要执行这些数据操作，请设置相应的命令文本和任何关联的参数为你想要执行的操作。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，对于更新操作，设置到一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称的属性并添加到任何所需的参数集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the collection. 执行更新时显式由你的代码或通过数据绑定控件自动调用方法。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 都将执行相同的常规模式和操作。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. SQL 查询和命令中使用， ， ，和可以参数化的属性。The SQL queries and commands that you use in the , , , and properties can be parameterized. 这意味着查询或命令可以使用占位符，而不是文本值并将占位符绑定到应用程序或用户定义的变量。This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables. 你可以将 SQL 查询中的参数绑定到会话变量，在 Web 窗体页的查询字符串传递的值、 其他服务器控件，以及更多的属性值。You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more. 有关如何在包含的 SQL 查询中使用参数的详细信息，请参阅[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)和[使用参数与 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the , see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，如果其中一个参数是`null`执行时`Select`命令时，将返回任何数据，并会引发任何异常。By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown. 你可以通过设置来更改此行为属性`false`。You can change this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## 数据提供程序Data Provider 默认情况下，控件与.NET Framework 数据提供程序适用于 SQL Server，但不是 Microsoft SQL Server 特定。By default, the control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but is not Microsoft SQL Server–specific. 你可以连接托管的 ADO.NET 提供程序提供任何数据库产品使用的控件。You can connect the control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider. 如果用于提供程序，可以处理任何 OLE DB 兼容的数据库。When used with the provider, the can work with any OLE DB-compliant database. 如果用于提供程序，可以用于任何 ODBC 驱动程序和数据库，包括 IBM DB2、 MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。When used with the provider, the can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. 如果用于提供程序， Oracle 8.1.7 数据库和更高版本可以工作。When used with the provider, the can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later. 允许的提供程序的列表中未注册`DbProviderFactories`配置文件，请在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中的部分。The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择数据使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). ## 缓存Caching 如果在使用你页上显示数据控件，你可以通过使用数据缓存的数据源控件的功能提高页的性能。If you display data on your page using a control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control. 缓存可减少在 Web 服务器; 上的内存为代价的数据库服务器上的处理负载在大多数情况下，这是一个良好的平衡。Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off. 自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为在缓存中存储数据的缓存项将被丢弃之前的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 你还可以指定和可选值。You can also specify a and an optional value. ## 其他功能Additional Features 提供其他功能，如以下表中列出。The provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |缓存Caching|设置属性值，属性`true`，和和根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| |正在删除Deleting|设置到用于删除数据的 SQL 语句的属性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to delete data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |筛选Filtering|设置属性值。Set the property to the value. 设置属性用来筛选数据的筛选表达式时调用方法。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |插入Inserting|设置属性以插入数据所用的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to insert data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |分页Paging|当前支持的 not ，但是一些数据绑定控件，如，支持分页设置时属性值。Not currently supported by the , however some data-bound controls, such as , support paging when you set the property to the value.| |选择Selecting|设置用于检索数据的 SQL 语句的属性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to retrieve data.| |排序Sorting|将 属性设置为 。Set the property to .| |UpdatingUpdating|设置到用于更新数据的 SQL 语句的属性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to update data. 此语句通常参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| ## 数据源视图Data Source View 与所有数据源控件，控件所关联的数据源视图类。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 控件仅有一个关联，并且始终名为`Table`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `Table`. 没有没有可视化呈现控件; 它作为实现控件，以便你可以创建它以声明方式和 （可选） 若要允许应用程序参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management. 因此，不支持 visual 功能，例如那些由或属性。As a result, the does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the or property. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424). 本部分包含四个代码示例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何显示中的 SQL Server 中的数据控制是通过使用声明性语法。The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a control using declarative syntax. - 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从符合 ODBC 的数据库中的数据控制是通过使用声明性语法。The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a control using declarative syntax. - 第三个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据控件。The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. - 第四个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据控件。The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件以声明方式从 SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件以声明方式从符合 ODBC 的数据库中检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 属性是用于 ODBC，这是.NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称。The property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/CS/odbc3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/VB/odbc3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示常见的显示和更新方案中的使用控件。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 如与上述示例中，从 Northwind 数据库的数据显示在控件。As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 此外，因为指定属性和属性设置为`true`，你可以编辑和任何其他代码使用更新记录。Additionally, because an property is specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控件自动处理添加到参数集合并调用方法时**更新**按钮控件被单击。The control automatically handles adding parameters to the collection and calls the method when the **Update** button in the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/CS/sql5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/VB/sql5vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示常见的显示和更新方案中的使用和控件。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the and controls. 控件不会自动添加到更新参数集合也不调用方法，因此你必须这样做。The control does not automatically add update parameters to the collection nor call the method, so you must do so. 以声明方式指定更新参数，并且可以添加事件处理程序执行操作时将引发一个事件。The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the operation when an event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用中，由标识属性。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 该值可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控制使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using the constructor. 该示例很少将，控件用于不在 Web 窗体页中，而是中间层对象的实现中的业务对象的简单方法与数据库交互。The example is unusual in that the control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database. 该示例使用存储在 Web.config 文件中的连接字符串。The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用中，由标识`providerName`参数。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the `providerName` parameter. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 在缓存过期，方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值为 0 指示无限期的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 持续时间的组合来确定缓存的行为和属性。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the property. 如果属性设置为值，缓存上的第一个数据检索操作的数据、 将其在内存中保留的最多，由指定的时间量属性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by property. 如果所需的内存，则可能之前持续时间，发布数据。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required. 在下一步操作期间，然后刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果属性设置为值，数据源控件在第一个数据检索操作上, 缓存数据，但将重置为每个后续操作的缓存的时间范围。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 缓存过期，如果一段时间，它等于没有任何活动自上次操作后的值操作。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控件可以缓存数据，仅当它处于时模式。The control can cache data only when it is in mode. A引发异常方法，如果控件设置为值和缓存也被启用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件，启用数据缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 设置为 20 秒，因为属性设置为值默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。The is set to 20 seconds and, because the property is set to the value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

A引发异常方法，如果控件设置为值和缓存也被启用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件，启用数据缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 因为属性设置为值，用户将看不保持数据即使值为 20 秒。Because the property is set to the value, users will not see fresh data even though the value is 20 seconds. 只有在没有活动的页上自最后一个页面加载超过 20 秒刷新的缓存的数据。The cached data is refreshed only if there is no activity on the page for more than 20 seconds since the last page load. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/CS/sql19cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/VB/sql19vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 在缓存过期，方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 你可以设置要创建由创建的所有缓存项之间的依赖项属性控件和密钥。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 以编程方式，您可以通过使密钥过期随时终止所有缓存条目。You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 控件可以缓存数据中的时，才模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. A引发异常方法，如果控件设置为值和缓存也被启用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. 对每个组合都创建一个唯一的缓存条目， ，和属性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , and properties. 多个控件可以使用相同的缓存条目在方案中控件从相同的基础数据库加载相同的数据的位置。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的旧和新值的参数适用于`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果该命令是指定属性返回对象包含列`Name`和`Number`和属性设置为值，为创建参数`Name`和`Number`为`Update`方法。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果属性设置为值，参数为创建`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称属性。)控件然后确定如果`Update`中指定的方法属性具有匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种数据存储区使用来控制如何读取和更改存储区中，在访问和操作同一数据多个客户端数据的技术。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一台客户端读取数据，并将其呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取同一数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交至数据存储，则可能会发生某种意外的结果，因为两个客户端可能会更新相同数据的不同值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这是被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过设置属性值，你`Update`方法然后可以将比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突，并根据需要处理它们，新旧值。By setting the property to the value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可与各种 ADO.NET 提供程序和用于连接到基础数据源的连接字符串的语法是特定于提供程序。The control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider. 当你配置控件，则设置到的数据库的类型的属性 (默认值是)，你将设置为为连接字符串，其中包含所需连接的信息的属性到数据库。When you configure a control, you set the property to the type of database (the default is ), and you set the property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database. 连接字符串的内容不同，具体取决于哪种类型的数据库访问数据源控件。The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing. 例如，控件要求服务器名称、 数据库 （目录） 名称和有关如何连接到 SQL Server 时，用户进行身份验证信息。For example, the control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server. 有关的连接字符串的内容的相关信息，请参阅属性类，属性类，属性类，或属性类。For information about the contents of connection strings, see the property for the class, property for the class, property for the class, or the property for the class. 如果你更改属性，引发事件时，导致绑定到任何控件控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有关存储连接字符串的信息，请参阅[How To： 安全连接字符串时使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性来连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果中的属性控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. 第二个代码示例演示的更复杂的方案，其中控件用于显示和更新受密码保护 Microsoft Access 数据库中的数据。The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database. 在每个情况下， `connectionStrings` Web.config 文件的元素显示第一个，包含 ASP.NET 页控件。In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性来连接到 SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果中的属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示的更复杂的方案，比前面的代码示例，其中控件用于显示和更新受密码保护访问数据库中的数据。The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database. 因为用于访问，属性设置为提供程序，与属性设置为适当的连接字符串为 UNC 共享访问数据库。Because the is used with Access, the property is set to the provider, and the property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database. A控件将显示包含发货日期的订单。A control displays orders with shipment dates. 你可以通过检查相应的复选框，然后单击更新订单**更新**按钮。You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个密码以纯文本格式仅用于说明目的。This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes. 在生产应用程序，包括密码的连接字符串应需要加密。In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护连接信息](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件获取数据所用的数据检索模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the data retrieval mode that the control uses to fetch data.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值是值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据检索模式标识如何控件从基础数据库中检索数据。The data retrieval mode identifies how a control retrieves data from the underlying database. 当属性设置为值，将数据加载到对象和存储在服务器上的内存。When the property is set to the value, data is loaded into a object and stored in memory on the server. 这使得用户界面控件，如，提供排序、 筛选和分页功能。This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as , offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities. 当属性设置为值，通过检索数据对象，它是只进、 只读游标。When the property is set to the value, data is retrieved by a object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor. 特定类型的对象依赖于的 NET 数据提供程序，使用，由标识属性。The specific type of the object depends on the NET data provider that the uses, which is identified by the property. 默认情况下，控件对于 Microsoft SQL Server，使用提供程序，并将数据读取器对象。By default, the control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the , and the data reader is a object. 如果你更改属性，引发事件时，导致绑定到任何控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 值属性存储视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性控制转移到有关带的方案值控件不需要排序、 分页和筛选。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control to the value for a scenario with a control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字符串和 集合中的所有参数执行删除操作。

span.span: Performs a delete operation using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示从基础数据库中删除的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行删除操作之前，调用方法来引发事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行删除操作之前任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation. 在操作完成后，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以编程方式访问`Delete`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method. 如果控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用**删除**方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method. 方法会委托给方法与关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行此操作，生成对象使用文本和任何关联值，并执行对基础数据库。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在控件。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 你必须显式声明属性并调用方法使用数据绑定控件，如(不同于其他控件，如和，这两者自动填充参数和调用上数据源控件的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此示例中，事件委托给私有`OnDelete`显式调用的事件处理程序方法控件。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeleteCommand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DeleteCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化的查询或命令，该参数的语法也取决于正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，该参数的语法是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据库支持存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全考虑，属性不存储视图状态中。For security purposes, the property is not stored in view state. 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除一个订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 从订单表检索数据并将其显示在控件。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈现**删除**自动按钮时属性设置为`true`。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true`. 此外，当**删除**单击按钮时，控件自动填充集合并调用方法。Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the control automatically populates the collection and calls the method. 最后，此代码示例将删除数据，因为事件处理程序添加尝试数据库备份到磁盘之前执行操作。Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理删除操作完成后，若要检查的值的事件输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a delete operation has completed. 输出参数均可用从与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，集合包含任何对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. > [!NOTE] > 请确保没有绑定到数据绑定控件中的控件控件具有与匹配中的所有参数名名称集合。Make sure that no controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the control have names that match any parameter names in the collection. 可能会导致具有相同的名称，如绑定的字段不从 SQL 命令和"未提供参数"的错误的参数。Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result. 如果属性设置为参数值，创建数据的旧和新值。If the property is set to the value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data. 旧值的参数命名根据属性。The parameters for the old values are named according to the property. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，通过使用 SQL 查询中的占位符匹配参数的名称来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在控件。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 你必须显式声明属性并调用方法使用数据绑定控件，如(不同于其他控件，如和，这两者自动填充参数和调用上数据源控件)。You must explicitly declare property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call on a data source control). 在此示例中，事件委托给私有`OnDelete`显式调用的事件处理程序方法控件。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行删除操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作控件将执行删除操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，将无法取消该操作，直接通过调用方法由公开的对象对象。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作属性对象传递给`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理之前，将引发的事件执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a operation occurs. 因为此示例从 Northwind 数据库中，将删除数据添加处理程序，以尝试数据库备份到磁盘之前执行操作。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否启用数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 在缓存过期，方法从基础数据库中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为一个值大于 0，表示缓存将数据存储在检索之前的秒数新集合。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中的 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件，启用数据缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 属性设置为`true`和设置为 20 秒。The property is set to `true` and the is set to 20 seconds. 因为属性设置为字段默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。Because the property is set to the field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

member this.FilterExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置调用 方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 表示使用 方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是一个格式字符串表达式 (string，由处理方法)，它使用中的值包括在字符串中任何替换参数的集合。The property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the method) that uses the values in the collection for any substitution parameters included in the string. 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受属性，因为筛选器表达式应用于属性从执行返回的对象方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property, because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 如果你将参数添加到集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符 (例如，`"{0}")`中要替换参数值的表达式。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 如果中的某个对象集合是`null`，该对象将替换为一个空字符串。If an object in the collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string. 你可以包含在参数属性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数是字符串或字符类型，请将参数括在单引号。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要，引号引起来。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含的参数，其计算结果中找到的占位符属性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控件支持筛选数据时，才在模式。The control supports filtering data only when in the mode. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用字符串和集合。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a string and the collection. 属性应用任何时间执行方法中检索数据。The property is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，筛选器参数是绑定到的对象属性控件。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因为控件具有其属性设置为`true`，所选内容中的任何更改控制会导致页发回发到服务器的信息和控件重新绑定到数据源使用新的筛选器来控制。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the control causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行插入操作之前，调用方法来引发事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the operation. 若要执行插入操作，对象生成对象使用文本和任何关联属性，然后执行对基础数据库对象。To perform an insert operation, the object builds an object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在操作完成后，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以编程方式访问`Insert`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method. 如果控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用`Insert`方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method. 方法会委托给方法与关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库，然后进行刷新。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以 SQL 字符串或名称的存储过程，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 此属性委托给属性关联控件。This property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全考虑，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息到所选行的控件和为窗体以插入新记录。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row into the control and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 你可以通过输入值插入添加新记录控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values into the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库中，与刷新控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的控件和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the control and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据将显示在控制和所选的行的也会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个具有和属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，自动填充集合的值的绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象和参数对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，调用事件处理程序来处理显示事件，插入的行的主键的值与方法控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 它还演示如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。It also demonstrates how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 控件将显示一组数据和显示的特定行的详细信息。The control displays a set of data and the displays the details for a particular row. 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 在中设置的存储的过程名称属性和标识为存储过程，通过设置属性值。The stored procedure name is set in the property and identified as a stored procedure by setting the property to the value. 数据插入到数据库后控件，调用事件处理程序来处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。After data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserted As SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 完成插入操作后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an insert operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理完成插入操作后，若要检查的值的事件输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an insert operation has completed. 输出参数均可用从与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 最初，数据将显示在控制和所选的行的也会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个具有和属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，自动填充集合的值的绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象和参数对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，调用事件处理程序来处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行插入操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作控件将执行插入操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，将无法取消该操作，直接通过调用方法由公开的对象属性。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the property. 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作属性对象传递给`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 最初，数据将显示在控制和所选的行的也会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个具有和属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，自动填充集合的值的绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象和参数使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，调用事件处理程序来处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和`DataBind`方法控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the `DataBind` method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索所包含的属性与关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如果属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，集合包含任何对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件中，将集合中的参数相关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数的名称匹配。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库中，与刷新控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何通过使用代码而不标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

member this.OldValuesParameterFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有参数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the or method.

value.span: 一个表示格式的字符串，该格式字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有 参数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 默认值为“{0}”。

span.span: The default is "{0}".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串仅应用于主键，例如那些由标识`DataKeyNames`属性关联的数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一组`oldValues`传递给相应的数据方法。The format string is applied only to primary keys, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the associated data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 两个常见的方案，你可能要更改属性如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要区分中更新的旧和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 当属性设置为值，参数的原始列值和新值添加到集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 没有格式设置字符串，将为每个数据字段创建具有相同名称的两个参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，你可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并比较键值的数据。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器实现原始值和键的特定命名的方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

summary.span: 获取或设置 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称， 控件使用该提供程序来连接基础数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the control uses to connect to an underlying data source.

value.span: 所使用的数据提供程序的名称；如果没有设置任何提供程序，则为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the data provider that the uses; otherwise, the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, if no provider is set.

value.span: 默认值为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The default is the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 包括以下数据提供程序：The .NET Framework includes the following data providers: - 提供程序是默认 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. - 提供程序是 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. - 提供程序是适用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. - 提供程序是适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 属性永远不会设置为的名称的非托管的 ADO.NET 提供程序，如`MSDAORA`。The property is never set to the name of an unmanaged ADO.NET provider, such as `MSDAORA`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择数据使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). 如果你更改属性，引发事件时，导致绑定到任何控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 在指定的可用提供程序列表`DbProviderFactories`的小节`system.data`Machine.config 文件部分。A list of available providers is specified in the `DbProviderFactories` subsection of the `system.data` section of the Machine.config file. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码演示如何连接到 SQL Server 数据库使用默认.NET Framework 数据提供程序用于的 SQL Server控件， 。The first code demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server for the control, the . 第二个代码示例演示如何连接到 ODBC 数据库使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC， 。The second code example demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 下面的代码示例演示如何连接到 SQL Server 数据库使用的默认数据提供程序控件， 。The following code example demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default data provider for the control, the . 每当属性未显式设置，则使用默认的提供程序。Whenever the property is not explicitly set, the default provider is used. 属性是特定于提供程序。The property is provider-specific. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上与前面的代码示例相同，演示如何连接到 ODBC 数据库使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC， 。The following code example, which is functionally the same as the preceding code example, demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 属性设置为用于连接到 ODBC 数据库 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN) that is used to connect to the ODBC database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/CS/odbc1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/VB/odbc1vb.aspx#1)]
