span.span: An list of data rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间自动调用方法页生命周期的阶段。The method is automatically called during the phase of the page life cycle. 它由已附加到的数据绑定控件通过控制其属性。It is called by data-bound controls that have been attached to a control through their property. 方法返回对象如果属性设置为值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 方法返回对象如果属性设置为值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 关闭对象读取数据完毕。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 之前执行操作，则调用方法来引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any processing before the operation. 后操作完成，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 如果属性设置为和启用缓存，则对象检索数据并将数据保存到在过程缓存操作。If the property is set to and caching is enabled, the object retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 创建缓存，丢弃，或刷新基于指定的组合的缓存行为和属性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索的数据，若要验证的数据库的安全配置，不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval of data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. 如果属性设置为和指定属性，筛选器表达式计算与任意提供属性和生成筛选器应用于数据列表期间操作。If the property is set to and a property has been specified, the filter expression is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法会委托给方法与关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行数据检索操作，生成对象使用文本和任何关联值，并执行对基础数据库。To perform a data retrieval operation, the builds a object by using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式调用方法和设置基于查询的结果值。The following examples show how to programmatically call the method and set values based on the result of the query. 下面的示例演示 Web 控件的声明性代码。The following example shows the declarative code for the Web controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式调用方法。The following example shows how to programmatically call the method. 控件返回一个整数。The control returns an integer. 整数值用于设置的文本控件并确定是否显示控件。The value of the integer is used to set the text of a control and to determine whether to display a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库检索数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称， 使用它检索数据。

span.span: An SQL string or the name of a stored procedure that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并通过使用方法来从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据。The property represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method to retrieve data from a SQL Server database. 如果你选择的命令中使用星号 （\*） 以选择所有列，并且如果你使用自动代码生成方法来执行更新或删除操作，请确保没有列将包含在其名称中的空格。If you use an asterisk (\*) in the Select command to select all columns, and if you use automatic code generation to perform update or delete operations, make sure that no columns have spaces in their names. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全考虑，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从符合 ODBC 的数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 第二个代码示例演示如何设置到存储过程的名称的文本和属性值才能从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其显示在控件。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 在这两个示例中，没有无需显式调用方法因为通过控件附加到数据源的数据绑定控件属性将自动调用期间方法阶段。In both examples, there is no need to explicitly call the method because the data-bound controls that are attached to the data source control through the property will automatically call the method during the phase. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从符合 ODBC 的数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/CS/odbc4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/VB/odbc4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置到存储过程的名称的文本和属性值才能从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 属性可以是 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作控件将执行选择操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the select operation. 选择参数是可从与事件相关联的对象。The select arguments are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，集合包含任何对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件中，将集合中的参数相关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数的名称匹配。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 数据库中检索数据，通过设置向 SQL 查询的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. 参数化 SQL 查询和中的占位符属性匹配到对象添加到集合。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 控制哪些绑定到、 新增功能的筛选器将显示在充当控件。The control, which the is bound to, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. 有关其他类型的参数可以使用的信息，请参阅类概述。For information about other types of parameters you can use, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 因为默认情况下，用于在 WHERE 子句中，使用属性中的代码示例在功能上等效于使用和属性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in the code example is functionally equivalent to using the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算属性仅当 SQL 命令，它是包含属性是存储过程的名称。The property is evaluated only when the SQL command that is contained by the property is the name of a stored procedure. 在这种情况下，如果属性设置，它包含用于对存储过程的结果进行排序的参数的名称。In this case, if the property is set, it contains the name of a parameter that is used to sort the results of the stored procedure. 如果属性设置，它被预置属性。If the property is set, it is prepended to the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用分号分隔的字符串，指示用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示用于 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持基于一个可选的到期策略（此服务必须配置为数据库服务器） 的数据缓存的对象。The control supports an optional expiration policy based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). 字符串标识数据库和表根据相同的格式由`@ Page`指令，其中字符串的第一部分是 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库的连接字符串后, 跟一个冒号分隔符，和最后的数据库表的名称 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1"`)。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a Microsoft SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果属性取决于多个表，之间用分号分隔的连接字符串表名称对 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`)。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string-and-table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用的在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，当第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不通过另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且你希望每个检索到的数据库的安全性配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 缓存依赖项并设置属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此示例中，轮询一次数据库每隔 120 秒。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. 如果在 Northwind Traders 员工数据在这个过程中表的更改时间，由缓存任何数据控制和显示控件将通过刷新控制的下次轮询一次数据库。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is refreshed by the control the next time the database is polled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/CS/sql23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/VB/sql23vb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示基础数据库中被更新的行数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将自动调用， ，和控件回发期间，如果数据已更改。The method is automatically called by the , , and controls during postback if the data has been changed. 已在其他控件中，更改的数据方法可以显式调用在回发过程事件。For data that has been changed in other controls, the method can be explicitly called on postback during the event. 之前执行操作，则调用方法来引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 后操作完成，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件，检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法会委托给方法与关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行更新操作，生成对象使用文本和任何关联属性，然后执行对基础数据库对象。To perform an update operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示中的数据控件和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The second code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示中的数据控件和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 属性已使用参数化的 SQL 语句，以及两个设置参数添加到集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 当**提交**单击按钮时，处理事件以调用方法显式。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 SQL Server 数据库中检索的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用对象使用时添加事务上下文控件更新数据。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UpdateCommand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UpdateCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件更新基础数据库中的数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: 更新数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果该提供程序是，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全考虑，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可能的客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，视图中将有关数据库结构的敏感信息的存储状态可能导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性在 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何更新在 ODBC 数据库中使用的数据控件。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性在 SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 自动填充集合，推断从参数对象，并调用方法时**更新**上可编辑链接选择。The automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable is selected. 此示例还包括一些后续处理： 更新某个记录后，会发送通知电子邮件消息。This example also includes some post-processing: after a record is updated, a notification email message is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上等同于前面的代码示例，演示如何更新在 ODBC 数据库中使用的数据控件。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 设置适用于 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供程序为，和属性设置为 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件可以检查的值后更新操作已完成，则输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 输出参数均可用从与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和更新从 ODBC 数据库中检索到的数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 已成功更新某个记录后，事件由事件处理程序执行的后续处理步骤中发送电子邮件通知。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email notification is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，集合包含任何对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会影响属性，具体来说，如果名称标识为主键，如使用指定密钥`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件中，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一组`oldValues`传递给相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property, specifically if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要，具体取决于的 ADO.NET 提供程序。The order of the parameters in the collection might be important, depending on the ADO.NET provider. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件中，将集合中的参数相关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数的名称匹配。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示中的数据控件和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 已使用参数化的 SQL 语句以及两个设置参数添加到集合。The is set with a parameterized SQL statement and two parameters are added to the collection. 当**提交**单击按钮时，处理事件以调用方法显式。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 该示例包括一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框和值插入到参数而无需验证，也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作控件将执行更新操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您无法直接取消通过调用数据库操作方法由公开的对象对象。Therefore, you cannot directly cancel the database operation by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作属性到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入到参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便在执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用对象使用时添加事务上下文控件更新数据。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
